document_notes.text:
This update for libofx fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-9656: Fixed null pointer dereference in function OFXApplication:startElement in lib/ofx_sgml.cpp (bsc#1129596)
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: An issue was discovered in LibOFX 0.9.14. There is a NULL pointer dereference in the function OFXApplication::startElement in the file lib/ofx_sgml.cpp, as demonstrated by ofxdump.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
